<<blah blah archmage who can't attack, but all scenarios are reset blah 
blah>>

Sounds like this might be a good character to throw on a team of normal 
characters. Or, more practically, you might run an orc or cleric or some 
other tough-but-useless-and-slow character over his HP limit and have him 
just sit there and stagnate, resetting the scenario while your other 
characters do the fighting.
